item.title: Kotlin Static Factory Methods
item.description: Static Factory Methods known from Java have their place also in Kotlin, although they look and behave a bit different because there is no static word in Kotlin. Here I’ll try to show how to use companion object for Static Factory Methods and more. PS: This whole post was supposed to be about Factory Method with just a short mention about static factory methods, but the topic becomes more interesting than I thought :)
